servinfo.title: Center Differential Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Transfer Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly:Non-Shift Type (Transfer without Shift Actuator)

s1.ptxt: Using spring pin remover (1) with 3 mm (0.1 in.) and hammer, drive out spring pin (2).
Disassemble center differential pinions (4) and pinion shaft (3) in center differential case (5).

servinfosub.title: Reassembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse disassembly procedure for Reassembly noting the followings.

item.ptxt: Using spring pin remover and hammer, drive in new spring pin (1) till the protrusion “a” from differential case (2) surface is 1.3 mm (0.051 in.).
